page.title: 07MORMON CHURCH
page.content: The{Mormon Church}is near Penn Inn roundabout. The road is called{ {Marychurch Road.}There are more Mormon churches all over England. This church was built in{1973.}About{150}people attend weekly. The people have to give{one tenth}of their money to the church. The priests don't get paid for their work. On Sundays they have a Sunday School. They are having an extension built on, with the money donated by the people.{Mormon's}belong to a church whose members are found mostly in{Utah State}in the{U.S.A.}The correct name of their church is the{ {Church of Jesus Christ of Latter Day {Saints,}that is{Christians of Jesus {Christ's last day on Earth,}but they are usually called{Mormon's}because they take part of their religion from the{Book of Mormon's.}
